title: Comprehensive Pain Center
description: Meet the care team at the Comprehensive Pain Center at OHSU.
cleaned_text: Our Team Our team of pain experts work together to care for all of your pain needs. All of our board-certified anesthesiologists are fellowship-trained, which means they have extra training in pain care. They work closely with our nurse practitioners and our other specialists in massage, chiropractic, acupuncture, Rolfing, physical and psychological therapies. Call us today to make an appointment or refer a patient: [503 494-7246](tel:503 494-7246) Physicians - - [Kimberly M. Mauer, M.D.](/people/kimberly-m-mauer-md) - Vice Chair for Pain Management - - - [Grace Chen, M.D.](/people/grace-chen-md) - Medical Director of Inpatient/Adult Pain Service; Program Director Pain Medicine Fellowship - - - [Sandy Christiansen, M.D.](/people/sandy-christiansen-md) - Assistant Professor - - - [Salman Hirani, M.D.](/people/salman-hirani-md) - Assistant Professor - - - [Andrei Sdrulla, M.D., Ph.D.](/people/andrei-sdrulla-md-phd) - Associate Program Director Pain Medicine Fellowship - - - [David M.
